text: {A} is practically indifferent to the outcome.
{A} sees the matter as slightly important.
{A} considers the case as somewhat important
{A} finds the situation quite important, it will occupy a significant number of thoughts
{A} is unable to think of much else. It must try to win, on the condition that there is no risk of itself being lost.
{A} considers this to take precedence over anything else.
